//Note: General instructions for to give to research subject before subject.

Thank you for participating in this experiment. The survey your about to take will allow us the opportunity to analyze electrical signals
your brain gives off. Many of these questions are focused on getting you to think about a specfic concept. The concept may or may not be 
disclosed by the researchers conducting the experiment. Since our results rely on how much you think about this the subject matter, please
try and stay focused on it. The questions in this survey may be open-ended, not requiring a response. For these questions, you simply need 
to think about the answer, unless otherwise stated. For questions asking for a response, simply give an appropriate response. Report any errors
to the supervising researcher.
